newsitem.title: USA: Tandy files shelf offering of $300 mln.
newsitem.headline: Tandy files shelf offering of $300 mln.

text.p: Tandy Corp filed Friday with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission a shelf offering of up to $300 million in debt securities.

The Fort Worth, Texas retailer of consumer electronics and computers said $150 million of the securities will be issued as notes due June 15, 2007 and will be underwritten by Bear, Stearns & Co Inc, Merrill Lynch & Co, Salomon Brothers Inc and Rauscher Pierce Refsnes Inc.
Proceeds from the sale will be used to reduce short-term bank debt, the company said in the shelf offering.
